casebody.data:
James C. TOTH, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Kimberly A. STEWART, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157414
COA: 339928 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 29, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 7, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
